mandatoryFields.project.name: Superhumans Directory
mandatoryFields.brandFoundations.brandDescription: Building the world's most comprehensive and transparent directory of longevity experts, powered by data and driven by a vision of a healthier, longer-living humanity.
mandatoryFields.brandFoundations.mission: To democratize access to information about the world's leading longevity experts, making cutting-edge aging research and innovation transparent and accessible to everyone.
mandatoryFields.brandFoundations.vision: A world where breakthrough discoveries in longevity science reach those who can benefit most, accelerating the path to healthier, longer lives for all humanity.
mandatoryFields.problemDefinition.primaryProblem: Lack of transparency and centralized, data-driven information about impactful people in longevity, aging research, and biohacking.
mandatoryFields.solutionOverview.valueProposition: A transparent, data-driven directory of the most impactful people in longevity, aging research, biohacking, and wellness, updated daily.
mandatoryFields.targetAudience[0].name: Researchers & Journalists
mandatoryFields.targetAudience[0].painPoints: Difficulty finding verified experts, validated sources, and understanding expert networks.
mandatoryFields.targetAudience[0].jobsToBeDone: Discover top experts, verify credentials via sources, and map collaboration networks.

recommendedFields.positioningAndMessaging.tagline: Discover the World's Top Longevity Experts

project.name: Superhumans Directory
project.client: Superhumans Directory (Powered by Ministry of Programming)
project.description: A comprehensive, data-driven directory and ranking system for longevity experts, featuring automated discovery via APIs (PubMed, Crossref, Listen Notes), network visualization, and transparency analytics.

brandFoundations.brandDescription: The world's most comprehensive directory of longevity experts, updated daily with transparent, data-driven rankings.
brandFoundations.mission: To democratize access to information about the world's leading longevity experts, making cutting-edge aging research and innovation transparent and accessible to everyone.
brandFoundations.vision: A world where breakthrough discoveries in longevity science reach those who can benefit most, accelerating the path to healthier, longer lives for all humanity.
brandFoundations.problemStatement: Longevity research is fragmented, making it difficult for students, researchers, and the public to identify credible experts and understand the landscape of aging science.
brandFoundations.solutionStatement: An automated, data-driven platform that aggregates, scores, and visualizes expert data from research publications, podcasts, and other public sources.
brandFoundations.brandEthos: Open data and evidence-based rankings that serve the global community.
brandFoundations.brandArchetype: The Sage (Knowledge, Truth) mixed with The Magician (Transformation/Longevity)
brandFoundations.brandPromise: Data-driven rankings backed by verifiable sources.

targetAudience.name: Media Organizations & Journalists
goals: Automatically pull expert profiles for articles
Find experts by specialty/region in real-time
painPoints: Hard to verify expert credentials quickly
Difficulty finding specific experts in niche regions (e.g., Nordic AI ethics)

targetAudience.name: Event Organizers
targetAudience.psychographics: Looking for engaging and authoritative speakers.
goals: Filter experts by topic and location
painPoints: Need to find speakers in specific locations

targetAudience.name: Longevity Enthusiasts
targetAudience.psychographics: Passionate about health extension and aging science.

positioningAndMessaging.tagline: Discover the World's Top Longevity Experts
positioningAndMessaging.positioningStatement: The most comprehensive and transparent longevity expert database available.
positioningAndMessaging.elevatorPitch: Superhumans Directory helps researchers, media, and the public discover the most impactful people in longevity science through a transparent, data-driven ranking system updated daily.
coreHooks: Automated discovery of experts via PubMed and Podcasts
narrativeFragments: From free radical theory to epigenetic clocks: the evolution of longevity science.

visualIdentity.logoPrimary: Not specifically defined in code, but uses text 'Superhumans Directory' with a trophy icon in some contexts.
visualIdentity.symbol: Trophy, Sparkles, DNA icons used frequently.

designInspiration.site: Not explicit, but 'Superhuman' (email client) vibe implied by name and gradients
designInspiration.notes: Uses 'Apple-inspired layered shadows' and 'spring physics' transitions.

competitiveAnalysis.positioningSummary: Positioned as a specialized, open, and automated alternative to general academic databases or manual lists.
competitors: Implied: General academic search engines (Google Scholar)

keyOpportunities: Automated aggregation of multi-channel data (research + podcasts + books)
Specific focus on the booming longevity market
uniqueSellingPoints: Weighted scoring algorithm combining Research, Reach, Innovation, and Policy
Visual Network Graph of expert connections
differentiationStrategy.whiteSpaceInsights: Lack of centralized data combining academic rigor with public influence metrics.
blueOceanIndicators: Podcast guest analysis as a ranking factor

techRequirements: Supabase (Auth, Database, Storage, Edge Functions, Realtime)
webAndContentNotes.contentStrategyNotes: Heavily data-driven content, auto-generated expert profiles, manual editorial content for 'About' and 'Methodology'.

problemDefinition.context: The longevity field is growing rapidly, but information is scattered across journals, podcasts, and social media.
problemDefinition.primaryProblem: It is difficult to identify who the truly impactful experts are due to noise and lack of centralized data.
secondaryProblems: Distinguishing between scientific researchers and influencers
Understanding connections and collaborations between experts
Lack of regional visibility (e.g., Nordic experts)
problemDefinition.businessImpact: High potential for B2B API monetization (Recruitment, Media, Events).
hypotheses: Users value transparency in ranking algorithms.
Visualizing the network graph will reveal hidden influence patterns.
Automated discovery can keep the directory up-to-date better than manual curation.
constraints: API Rate limits (PubMed, Crossref, Listen Notes)
Free tier limits on 3rd party APIs

solutionOverview.valueProposition: A transparent, data-driven directory of longevity experts updated daily.
keyFeatures: Expert Directory with search and filtering
outOfScopeForNow: Social media follower tracking (mentioned as future phase/premium feature cost constraint)
User accounts for saving searches (Future phase)

earlyAdopterProfile.description: Longevity researchers, biohacking enthusiasts, and tech-forward journalists.
triggerEvents: Need to find a speaker for a conference

idealCustomerProfile.description: Organizations needing systematic access to expert data.

leanCanvas.uniqueValueProposition: The only longevity directory that combines academic research, public reach, and innovation metrics into a single transparent score.
leanCanvas.unfairAdvantage: Proprietary scoring algorithm and automated multi-source discovery pipeline.

screens.name: Expert Profile
screens.purpose: Detailed view of a specific expert.

phases.name: Browsing
phases.description: User lands on site and explores top lists.

aiMetadata.extractionSummary: Extracted project structure, brand foundations, target audience, data model, and system architecture from code, documentation files (DISCOVERY_*.md), and migration files.

lowConfidence: Specific branding assets (Logo files not visible)
Detailed user personas outside of broad categories

assumptions: The project is a startup founded by the individuals listed in the About page.
The 'Superhuman' name might be inspired by the email client but is distinct.
aiMetadata.extractionNotes: The repository contains comprehensive documentation in Markdown files which greatly aided extraction.
